original_text:
As many were astonished at you—
    his appearance was so marred, beyond human semblance,
    and his form beyond that of the children of mankind—
korean_text: 전에는 그의 모양이 타인보다 상하였고 그의 모습이 사람들보다 상하였으므로 많은 사람이 그에 대하여 놀랐거니와

sentences.original_text: As many were astonished at you—
and his form beyond that of the children of mankind—
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 모습은 인간 자손의 모습을 초월하였도다
